name: psr1bas2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c1)=(Base ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c1)=(Base ` c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (T →(Base ` c1)=(Base ` c2))

stmt.origin: opsrbas(c1, c2, c1o, c3, emptycls, wtru)
stmt.pretty: opsrbas(c1, c2, c1o, c3, emptycls, wtru)

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c3), emptycls))
-| wi(wtru, wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c3), emptycls))
-| wi(wtru, wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(1o[mPwSer]c3)
⊣ c2 =((1o[ordPwSer]c3)` ∅)
⊣ (T → ∅ ⊆(1o × 1o))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c3), emptycls))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cps1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c3))
-| wi(wtru, wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cps1, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(1o[mPwSer]c3)
⊣ (T → ∅ ⊆(1o × 1o))
⊣ c2 =(PwSer1 ` c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))
-| wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cps1, c3))
-| wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(1o[mPwSer]c3)
⊣ c2 =(PwSer1 ` c3)
⊣ ∅ ⊆(1o × 1o)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cps1, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(1o[mPwSer]c3)
⊣ c2 =(PwSer1 ` c3)

comment: The base set of the ring of univariate power series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
